ingredients: 8 green onions, white and light green portions, &nbsp thinly sliced
3 Tbs. chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, plus &nbsp parsley sprigs for garnish
3 Tbs. chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, plus &nbsp parsley sprigs for garnish
3 Tbs. chopped fresh mint, plus mint sprigs &nbsp for garnish
3 Tbs. chopped fresh basil, plus basil sprigs &nbsp for garnish
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
